description:
It`s the year 2020. The Network has become something humans can no longer do without in their daily lives. But what humans don`t know is that on the other side of the Network is the Digital World, a realm of light and darkness. Nor are they aware of the Digimon who live there.
Widespread Network difficulties arise, centered around the Tokyo area. Traffic signals blink chaotically, public outdoor TVs display garbled text, and so on. The news reports it as a case of cyberterrorism.
Fifth grader http://anidb.net/ch5123 [Yagami Taichi] stayed home by himself to get ready for a weekend summer camp, but his http://anidb.net/ch5188 [mother] and little sister http://anidb.net/ch5187 [Hikari] went to Shibuya, and now they`re aboard a runaway train. Taichi hurries to Shibuya to save his mother and sister, but the instant he heads toward the station platform... a strange phenomenon befalls the http://anidb.net/ch5204 [DigiDestined], and Taichi goes to the Digital World! The DigiDestined meet their partner Digimon, and they`re faced with an adventure into the unknown...!
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Taichi Yagami and Koshiro Izumi are two boys preparing for their kids’ club camping trip when Taichi’s mother and sister are caught in a cyberattack occurring in Tokyo. Taichi fights to save his family with a mysterious life form.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 東京デジタルクライシス

REGULAR.description:
Taichi comes face to face with a mysterious boy riding on the back of a Digimon inside the Network. The missile launch is approaching and Taichi and his friends must stop it at all costs.
Source: crunchyroll

An enormous, white Digimon fights with Taichi and Yamato to stop the missile just before it hits the metropolis. Shortly after the missile incident and the kids’ club camping trip, a new threat closes in on the city of Tokyo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: そしてデジタルワールドへ

REGULAR.description:
As Taichi is pulled back into the world of the Network, he finds himself before an unfamiliar scenery. A dangerous path is set before Taichi and the others to find the answers they seek.
Source: crunchyroll

Taichi and the others reach a place that looks like a temple in front of a mountain. They come to face the secret of the Digital World and the reason why they have been summoned there.
Source: crunchyroll

Taichi’s party comes across an orchard and meets a mysterious girl, Mimi. Taichi and his friends find out that a kingdom is targeted by some ferocious Digimon.
Source: Crunchyroll

The children now know that the Holy Digimon is the key to saving Tokyo from the blackouts. They attempt to cross the sea to get to the continent, but they’re suddenly attacked by a mysterious whirlpool.
Source: Crunchyroll

The children finally succeed in crossing the sea with Ikkakumon’s help. However, what awaits them on the other side is a fortress full of Digimon…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Angriff der Kinder auf die Festung
The Children`s Attack on the Fortress

REGULAR.description:
The six children and Digimon neutralize the fortress thanks to excellent teamwork. They try to decode the enemy’s communication log and obtain new information about the Holy Digimon. However, it’s not long before new enemies approach the fortress one after another.
Source: crunchyroll

The battle between Greymon and Orgemon ended abruptly and now the Chosen Ones discuss their next move. Taichi and Agumon take a chance to defeat the ultimate enemy, so that the others can safely head to their next destination.
Source: crunchyroll

The six Chosen Ones who had finally gathered split up again into two teams in order to find the Holy Digimon. As Yamato’s team attempts to cross the desert, they encounter some dust devils.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Wolf, der in der Wüste steht
The Wolf Standing Atop the Desert

REGULAR.description:
Taichi’s team reaches an ancient ruin. While Koshiro tries to analyze the characters on the walls, Mimi and Palmon accidentally fall underground. When they’re in danger, they encounter a kindhearted Digimon.
Source: crunchyroll

Yamato’s team flies above an endless jungle on Birdramon until they come across a floating fortress. Sora’s caring heart that wants to save Digimon in trouble brings about a new glow on Piyomon.
Source: crunchyroll

Taichi’s team reaches a canyon where they are attacked by a swarm of insect Digimon. In the chaos that ensues, Koshiro and Tentomon stand up to protect their friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Könige der Insekten prallen aufeinander
The Kings of the Insects Clash

REGULAR.description:
While Taichi’s team finishes fighting off Oukuwamon and Kuwagamon in the canyon maze, Sora’s team reaches a snowy mountain where they are attacked by a group of Digimon. Joe and Ikkakumon stand up to save Sora from danger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ズドモン 稲妻の鉄槌

REGULAR.description:
Taichi’s team finds a strange cave that leads to Tokyo. Excited to be back, the children attempt to get home through the subway. However, a creepy Digimon prowls the city, and there, the children learn a shocking truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der pechschwarze Schatten marschiert in Tokyo ein
東京侵食 漆黒の影

REGULAR.description:
Just when Taichi and his friends thought they had finally defeated the enemy in the fake Tokyo, a new enemy appeared. The children work together with their Digimon to take down the eight-headed Ultimate Digimon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Battle in Tokyo Against Orochimon
東京決戦 オロチモン

REGULAR.description:
The Chosen Ones worked together and succeeded in defeating Ultimate Digimon Orochimon. However, a mysterious countdown begins. To save Tokyo, they must prevent it from reaching zero.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 東京消滅 カウントダウン

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to Omegamon’s reappearance, the Mega Digimon Nidhoggmon, was finally defeated. However, Sora and the others disappeared after being swallowed by a storm. Taichi and Yamato, who are left behind in the Digital World sneak into Valvemon.
Source: crunchyroll

Yamato’s younger brother, Takeru, is unexpectedly found in the Digital World, held captive by a powerful Digimon. With the help of Leomon’s army, Taichi and Yamato attempt to save Takeru.
Source: crunchyroll

The Holy Digimon that turned into a Digitama was snatched away, and Taichi and Yamato chase after Skullknightmon. Meanwhile, the rest of the Chosen Ones that are back in Tokyo fight remotely with their partner Digimon in the Digital World.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Update, das die Wende bringt
逆転の武装鋼化[アップデート]

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to Takeru’s bravery, Taichi and the others found the way into the castle where the Digitama is held. As for the Chosen Ones in Tokyo, they were in a remote battle against Calamaramon to stop an uncontrollable tanker from crashing.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: 不屈の蒼き機翼[サジタリウス]

REGULAR.description:
Devimon’s castle collapsed after the fierce battle with Darkknightmon and Taichi’s group comes to face Devimon at last. Meanwhile, the rest of the Chosen Ones and their partner Digimon fight to destroy the obelisk that is transferring energy.
Source: Crunchyroll

Thanks to Koshiro’s group destroying the obelisk which was transferring energy to the Digital World, Taichi and the others defeated Neodevimon at last. However, Taichi struggles against the overwhelming powers of Donedevimon, a Mega Digimon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 終極 ダンデビモン

REGULAR.description:
The battle with Donedevimon is over at last. However, destiny wasted no time in bringing the next adventure to the Chosen Ones. Koshiro’s group is dealing with tanker collisions while Taichi’s group is attacked by a cluster of Mamemon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ダイブ 次なる海へ

REGULAR.description:
Taichi has fallen down to the ocean below Cloud Continent with Leomon and the others. Powerful, new Digimon attack them one after another. Meanwhile, Koshiro’s side tries carry out a counterplan to bring the unresponsive ships under control.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Break Through the Sea Monster Barricade

REGULAR.description:
Taichi’s younger sister Hikari and Koshiro`s group are brought to the Digital World just in time to save Taichi`s group. The Chosen Ones are now reunited once again. However, another disaster, this time at a rocket launch site, hits the real world.
Source: Crunchyroll

The Chosen Ones come to face their old enemy, Darkknightmon. Patamon evolves into Angemon again to fight off Darkknightmon. However, the children are all separated and sent to different parts of the continent.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: 子供たちのサバイバル

REGULAR.description:
Hikari is suddenly taken away by Skullknightmon and Taichi could do nothing but watch. On his mission to save Hikari, he meets many kinds of Digimon in the jungle and fights for them as the jungle burns.
Source: crunchyroll

Taichi and Agumon act as bait so that the jungle’s Digimon can safely escape. However, Metalgreymon’s attacks are useless against the new Mega Digimon that stands in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 究極体ウォーグレイモン

REGULAR.description:
Taichi and Agumon finally surpassed their limit, and Agumon evolves into Wargreymon. This evolution awakens Lopmon’s long-lost memories. And Taichi learns about the new threat, Millenniumon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新たな闇ミレニアモン

REGULAR.description:
Taichi’s group is continuing their adventure with Komondomon. They reunite with Takeru and Patamon, who are targeted by Fangmon. However, yet another threat is creeping up on them.
Source: crunchyroll

Taichi’s party finally catches sight of Skullknightmon and Hikari, who was kidnapped. Taichi chases after them, but Hikari is swallowed into the darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

Hikari and Tailmon are finally saved and they join Taichi’s group. Komondomon dives into a sea current to head toward their next destination. As they make their way underwater, they come across a mysterious city.
Source: crunchyroll

Taichi’s party leaves behind the beautiful underwater city and continues their journey toward the Eternal Continent’s center, FAGA. The party swims through the sea caves on Komondomon, but Digimon with powerful, dark energy block their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 煌くエンジェウーモン

REGULAR.description:
Taichi’s group reunites with Koshiro and Tentomon after rising to the surface. Koshiro figures out a plan to stop the International Space Station from crashing into Tokyo. Will the Chosen Ones make it in time?!
Source: crunchyroll

With the ISS no longer being a threat, Taichi and his party continues their adventure. Taichi and Sora, who go out to look for food, happen to reunite with Mimi and Palmon. Then they are suddenly pulled into Mimi’s project.
Source: crunchyroll

Yamato and Gabumon were on their way to rejoin the other Chosen Ones. However, they happened to pass by some mountains where a Digimon with an evil spell is. Now, great danger approaches Gabumon. Can Yamato save Gabumon in time?!
Source: crunchyroll

The eight Chosen Ones finally come together. They make a pit stop at the so-called Digimon’s oasis. There, Joe befriends a potato-loving Digimon, but his new friend’s love and sorrow over fries cause trouble.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ジャガモン ポテト地獄

REGULAR.description:
The Chosen Ones find some time to practice soccer with each other. But during their game, some fruits fall from the sky. Taichi and Sora go up to get more fruits and there, they encounter evil Digimon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決めろ! 必殺シュート

REGULAR.description:
Takeru and Yamato go to search for food. Suddenly, a theme park called Mon-Mon Park appears before them. They are begged by a Digimon to stay and stop by the park. But what awaits them is not a fun, happy place.
Source: crunchyroll

Taichi and Koshiro, who are scouting the area, come across a genius inventor, Gerbemon. Koshiro’s eyes sparkle as he sees the number of inventions Gerbemon has created from junk. However, an enemy Digimon suddenly attacks them.
Source: crunchyroll

The Chosen Ones come across an unfamiliar forest. There they meet Etemon and Volcamon who are battling over the title for the King of Digimon. Taichi and others are dragged into their fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突 キング・オブ・デジモン

REGULAR.description:
After travelling through many fields, the Chosen Ones finally come upon a forest. However, they find that the forest itself makes up a Digimon’s body. Hikari and the Chosen Ones help this Digimon fight an old nemesis.
Source: crunchyroll

The Chosen Ones come across what looks like a rundown racing circuit in the Digital World. There, they find a superfast Digimon, Machmon running alone. Gabumon, who loves to run, challenges Machmon to a race.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 起動 メタルガルルモン

REGULAR.description:
An eerie sphere, Sephirothmon suddenly appears. Taichi and the others are trapped inside Sephirothmon. There, an archenemy from the past, Devimon, appears before Takeru and Angemon.
Source: crunchyroll

Joe and Gomamon are separated and taken away by two groups of villains who are fighting over water. Taichi and Agumon go out to search for the two with the help of Nohemon, the guardian of water.
Source: crunchyroll

The Chosen Ones finally arrive at the Sealed Grounds, FAGA. However, the children must face Mugendramon, the Mega Digimon with tremendous power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ムゲンドラモンの襲撃

REGULAR.description:
The children do not hear from Taichi and Agumon, who stayed behind to take on Mugendramon. The children are in deep sorrow. Meanwhile, Millenniumon’s body is gradually being prepared for the resurrection.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der böse Gott steigt herab, Millenniumon
The God of Evil Descends, Millenniumon
邪神降臨ミレニアモン

REGULAR.description:
Taichi and Wargreymon are back to take on the revived Millenniumon. The rest of the Chosen Ones are trapped inside a prison chamber of time and space. Taichi and Wargreymon begin the decisive battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Ende des ultimativen heiligen Kampfes
The End, the Ultimate Holy Battle
Das Geheimnis, das sich in den Wappen verbirgt
The Mystery Hidden Within the Crests

REGULAR.description:
The Chosen Ones start new adventures to prevent the Great Catastrophe. Taichi and Sora reach an island with a volcano. When they help Junkmon build a wall to protect the Digimon living on the island, an eruption occurs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 天舞 ホウオウモン

REGULAR.description:
To heal Patamon and Tailmon, Joe and Gomamon take them to the hot springs they had been to before. However, the hot springs were all dried up. Soon after, they meet the hot springs` ruler, Tonosamagekomon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Revolte in den heißen Quellen von Geko

REGULAR.description:
After leaving behind Joe’s group, Taichi and Agumon are led by the Digivice to a barren wasteland full of outlaw Digimon. There they find Cutemon, and the lone-wolf Rebellimon who strives to fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さすらいの戦鬼リベリモン

REGULAR.description:
Mimi and Palmon reach the edge of the Cloud Continent close to the Tanemon`s village where Mimi once used to reign. There, they find a Digimon school and meet Babamon, who encourages them to enroll in the trial course.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 狙われたデジモン学校

REGULAR.description:
Yamato and Gabumon encounter Zanbamon who preys on Digimon night after night. However, Gabumon’s attacks have no effect on this mysterious enemy. They later learn the truth behind Zanbamon’s past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Gold Wolf of the Crescent Moon

REGULAR.description:
Taichi and Agumon are ambushed by an unknown force and sent to another place. There, Agumon is faced with the challenge of finding the real Taichi from dozens of copies that are all crying in pain for help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 破滅からの接触[コンタクト]

REGULAR.description:
Hikari and Tailmon are back at Petaldramon`s forest where they find Digitama all over the place. However, evil Digimon who are filled with hatred for new life are also drawn to this forest.
Source: crunchyroll

Koshiro and Tentomon find themselves back in the canyon they had once passed through earlier in the Digital World. There, they meet Nanomon, a Digimon who loves knowledge. Nanomon challenges Koshiro to a match in a dungeon full of riddles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 電光ヘラクルカブテリモン

REGULAR.description:
The hot springs had dried up again for some reason. Joe takes a group of Digimon with him and heads south to a warm place. However, they are attacked by pirates led by Olegmon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Vikemon wagt sich auf den Gletscher
氷河を征くヴァイクモン

REGULAR.description:
Takeru and Patamon help Eldoradimon who was struggling to climb up a mountain. The surrounding Digimon are not supportive and only watch hopelessly. However, Takeru won’t give up and attempts to send Eldoradimon home no matter what.
Source: crunchyroll

Sora and Piyomon reunite with Neamon, Junkmon and the other Digimon. Together, they revive the wastelands to create a Digimon town. However, the guardian deity, Shakkoumon awakens from a long slumber and starts attacking them.
Source: crunchyroll

After aimlessly following the arrow on the Digivice, Taichi and Agumon reach a castle. There, Taichi is separated from Agumon and is thrown into an unfamiliar world by a mysterious Digimon.
Source: crunchyroll

The Chosen Ones have each attained their crests and aim to reunite now. However, they receive an emergency call from Wisemon and Gerbemon that the laboratory is under attack. The Chosen Ones fight to protect the lab from a swarm of Digimon.
Source: crunchyroll

The Chosen Ones are separated from their partner Digimon and captured in the white void. There, the terrifying true form of the Great Catastrophe is revealed through Algomon’s words.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 巨大な破滅ネガーモン

REGULAR.description:
The Chosen Ones’ ultimate enemy, Negamon evolves. And the Great Catastrophe consumes both the Digital World as well as the human world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saigo no Kiseki: Saigo no Chikara
The Last Miracle, the Last Power
最後の奇跡 最後の力

REGULAR.description:
The final battle against Negamon begins. The Chosen Ones and their partner Digimon, their journey is about to reach its end.
Source: crunchyroll

WIKIPEDIA_JP: デジモンアドベンチャー:

titles.title: デジモンアドベンチャー:
